definition: (film) a gradual transition from one scene to the next, declare void
details:
noun
- (film) a gradual transition from one scene to the next
verb
- declare void

= synonyms: dismiss
- come to an end

= example: bring the association of to an end or cause to break up

- become or cause to become soft or liquid

- pass into a solution
= example: pass into a solution
- cause to go into a solution
= example: cause to go into a solution
= synonyms: resolve
- become weaker

- cause to fade away

- lose control emotionally
= example: lose control emotionally
- cause to lose control emotionally
= example: cause to lose control emotionally
- stop functioning or cohering as a unit
= example: stop functioning or cohering as a unit
